p.strong: DISCLAIMER: This app is a collection of pre-built panel. The links in the navigation showcase these panels. Do NOT attempt to clone any of these dashboards!

ol.li: Navigate to an existing dashboard. Learn how to create a dashboard with Create Dashboards or Create Dashboards Through a Search, both available in Splunk Docs.
From the top bar select + Add Panel > Add Prebuilt Panel.
Select the Add to Dashboard" button for your desired panel.

html.p: Additional instructions are available in the Add panels to dashboards topic in the Dashboards and Visualizations with Simple XML manual on Splunk Docs.
